mapper.select: SELECT res.RES_ID id, res.RES_NAME name, res.RES_PARENT_ID parentId, res.RES_KEY resKey, res.RES_URL resUrl, res.RES_LEVEL level, res.RES_DES description FROM SYS_USERS u LEFT JOIN SYS_USERS_ROLES ur ON u.USER_ID = ur.USER_ID LEFT JOIN SYS_ROLES r ON ur.ROLE_ID = r.ROLE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS_ROLES_RESOURCES rr ON rr.ROLE_ID = r.ROLE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS_RESOURCES res ON res.RES_ID = rr.RES_ID WHERE u.USER_ID = #{value}
